Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.MiniController

Class ChosenMiniController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.MiniController.ChosenMiniController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiniController, java.io.Serializable
public class ChosenMiniController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MiniController, java.io.Serializable
This MiniController checks the parsing of inputs during the initialization, when the player choose which god he wants to use.

      public boolean checkPos​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      This method actually parses the input
      Specified by:
      checkPos in interface MiniController
      Parameters:
      input - should be a string with 1 of length, representing an integer
      playSpace - The playspace where to search for the position (not needed)
      stringBuilder - a string placeholder to return the correct message to the player
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false elsewhere
